title: Looking for a Piano Accompanist for Graduation Recital
description: We are looking for a skilled pianist to accompany a graduation recital at Hanyang University. The performance will take place on 25/06/05 at 18:00. The repertoire includes a mix of classical and contemporary pieces. We are seeking someone who can rehearse in advance and perform on the recital day.
required: The ideal candidate should have strong piano skills, be comfortable with sight-reading, and have experience accompanying soloists. Reliability, musical sensitivity, and good communication are essential. Availability for at least one or two rehearsals before the recital is required.

title: Vocalist Wanted for Jazz Ensemble Recital
description: We are forming a small jazz combo for a performance at a student recital on 25/06/15. Looking for a jazz vocalist comfortable with standards and improvisation.
required: Must have basic jazz vocal training and experience performing with a live band. Ability to improvise (scat singing) is a plus.

title: Guitarist Needed for Pop Ballad Graduation Performance
description: Seeking an acoustic guitarist for a vocal major’s graduation performance featuring pop ballads. Concert will be held on 25/06/20 in the university recital hall.
required: Must be able to accompany vocals smoothly and follow dynamic cues. Experience playing live performances preferred.

title: Violinist Wanted for String Quartet (Classical Recital)
description: We are forming a string quartet for a chamber music recital at Hanyang University. The event will take place on 25/06/23.
required: Applicant must be able to read sheet music fluently and attend group rehearsals. Previous ensemble experience is highly desirable.

title: Piano Teacher Needed for Beginner Student (Short-Term)
description: Looking for a piano teacher to give private lessons to a beginner-level student preparing for a university entrance exam. Lessons will take place from June to August, once or twice a week.
required: Strong teaching skills, patience, and a good understanding of basic piano pedagogy required. Prior teaching experience preferred.

title: Session Drummer Wanted for Studio Recording
description: Seeking a session drummer for recording a 3-track indie rock EP at a professional studio in Seoul. Recording dates are set for early July.
required: Must have solid timing and experience with studio click tracks. Ability to adapt quickly and take feedback is important.

title: Cellist Needed for Graduation Recital (Contemporary Classical)
description: We are looking for a cellist to perform a contemporary classical piece as part of a graduation recital. Performance will take place on 25/06/28.
required: Must be able to read modern notation and interpret extended techniques. One rehearsal with composer required before performance.

title: Live Sound Engineer for Student Showcase
description: A live sound engineer is needed for a student music showcase taking place on 25/07/01. Genres include pop, jazz, and classical.
required: Basic experience with mixers, mics, and live sound equipment required. Must be available for soundcheck and performance.

title: Flutist Needed for French Repertoire Recital
description: Looking for a flutist to join a duo recital featuring French impressionist works (Debussy, Fauré). Concert is scheduled for 25/06/18.
required: Must be comfortable with technically demanding flute passages and able to rehearse twice before the performance.

title: Accompanist for Musical Theatre Vocalist
description: Musical theatre singer is looking for a pianist to accompany a short solo performance at a student showcase on 25/06/22.
required: Ability to play show tunes and follow tempo/rubato changes required. Prior experience in theatre accompaniment is a big plus.
